price: Respondieron: "Adoramos ídolos, a los que estamos consagrados".
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
